flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in width between where they're starting from and their destination is 80-50 = <<80-50=40>>40 yards
The width increases 2 yards every 10 m along the river so they would have to cover (40/2)*10 = <<(40/2)*10=200>>200 meters
Traveling at the rate of 5m/s, he will spend 200/5 = <<200/5=40>>40 seconds
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
